they are fun because of the challenge they bring to the game. if you would know how to deal with the hornets you wouldnt care about them so much. i worked alot with someone named memes and carlos and it was kinda fun just farming hornets. i let the hornets target me and they just attacked the hornets for me. when they were targeted i returned the offer dealing with hornets. alone is almost impossible but with teamwork its not much of a issue its challenging and i think it  1st encourages teamwork 2nd requires you to think of strategies 3rd helps you work on effective build 4th requires you to be skilled and lastly 5th its lowkey fun stealing good things from people when there being chased by hornets lol yet again i disagree with your statement

I understand where your coming from but just outright removing the hornets would be an extreme stretch honestly I do believe the hornets can be nerfed but all out removed is Way to much it’s a fun mechanic to the game as u have to work together to defeat the horde of hornets it kinda encourages people to work together to kill the hornets and they can help you get kills if the hornets were removed the game would feel dull and unchallenging a challenge in a game makes it very fun if you can’t handle the challenge I’m sorry but this game may not be for you I politely disagree with your statement

I have a cat myself and i would feel the same way might sound dumb but i actually started crying when my per grasshopper (of which i had for a entire year died) i would let him jump around in my room and here him chirp is was so cute it ate nearly all the greens i gave it and it was just a support for me to i still have a few pictures of him on my phone but hey things dont live forever soon enough my cat will die and i will Litarlly die in my emotions and ill have nobody to talk about it with and my crying would cause annoyance to everyone once my cat got tape worms even though he wasnt dying he was incredibly sick and i just clutched him while crying for about an hour worrying that he would die i seem to mourn over animal injuries more than family injuries for some reason well thats my dumb story took me awhile to write this i hope i dont get laughed at ;-;
